name: Lickitung
description: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be confused.  If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate.  If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.  This ability functions identically to air lock.
